Description: Rim and shoulder fragment of black-glazed pottery lekanis with reflex strap handle; handle markedly concave; carinated shoulder; wholly glazed with red bands at very top of rim and on wall in interior.
Curator's comments: The piece may perhaps be Attic rather than East Greek. Not the same piece as 1924,1201.902.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GO.378)
